Rule: Classes that have name matching "Dao" should reside in a package "..dao..".
Classes that in "..dao.." should access Classes that are Assignable to "EntityManager.class"
Classes that are public should not depend on classes that residing in package "..service..".
Classes that are public should not depend on classes that are assignable to "EntityManager".
Classes that in the "..impl.." package should not be interfaces.
Classes residing in the "..persistence.." package should not access any classes in the "..service.." package.
Classes in the "..service.." package should only be accessed by classes in the "..controller.." or "..service.." packages
Classes in the "..service.." package should access classes that in "..service..", "..persistence..", or "java.." package.
Classes in the "..service.." package should not depend on classes in the "..controller.." package
Classes in the "..service.." package should only have dependent classes in the "..controller.." or "..service.." packages.
Classes in the "..service.." package should only depend on classes in "..service..", "..persistence..", "java..", or "javax.." packages
Classes that In "..service.." package should not depend on classes that in package "..persistence.."
Classes that In package "..service.." should only depend on classes that in package "..persistence.." and "..controller.."
Classes that have name matching "Dao" should only depend on classes that in a package "..dao..".
No class should depend on an upper package.
Notes: The parameters such as Packages and upperPackages must all be specified.
